message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $130. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $130. I can do $135, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $135 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $132?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $134, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm getting close to walking away, but I really want this product. Would you be willing to meet me at $133?
